content:
You have decided to build 5 hospitals.

Building each hospital will cost $500000 and will increase the health level by 1%.

The new city status:
Population: 3190
Funds: -750000
Income: 1000000 + tax revenue (72% happiness \* $1000/resident)
Education Level: 61%
Employment Rate: 85%
Crime Rate: 8%
Health Level: 30%
Birth rate: 6.125%
Happiness level: 72%
Tax Revenue: $241250 (72% happiness \* $1000/resident)

Please let me know if you want to make any other actions in your city.
